paper_abstract: In this paper, the numerical treatment of a fourth order Lidstone boundary value problem is proposed with the use of a discrete quintic spline based on central differences. It is shown that the method is of order 4 if a parameter takes a specific value, else it is of order 2. A well known numerical example is presented to illustrate our method as well as to compare the performance with other numerical methods proposed in the literature.
paper_title: Numerical Solutions of Fourth Order Lidstone Boundary Value Problems Using Discrete Quintic Splines
